uk.co.optimisticpanda.gtest.dto.propertyaccess
Interface IPropertyAccess

public interface IPropertyAccess

These are used for introspection purposes.

One IPropertyAccess is created for each instance that extends PropertyAccessSupport.

Author:
Andy Lee
See Also:
IPropertyAccessFactory

Method Summary
 java.lang.Object getValue(java.lang.Object instance)
          Get the value of the property that this IPropertyAccess represents from a specific instance.
 void setValue(java.lang.Object instance, java.lang.Object value)
          Set the property belonging to an instance to the specified value.
